## What is a Data Lake?

A data lake is a single, centralized repository where both structured and unstructured data can be stored. A data lake enables quick easily storing, access, and analysis of a wide variety of data in a single location. With a data lake, you don't need to conform your data to fit an existing structure. Instead, you can store your data in its raw or native format, usually as files or as binary large objects (blobs).  
  

The DASH data lake is Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 which is a set of capabilities dedicated to big data analytics, built on Azure Blob Storage.
